kantumid_require_ethereum: KantumID requires an Ethereum client to be running and current. KantumID could not detect a client running which probably means it's not installed, running or is misconfigured.
p_use_clients: Please use one of the following clients to connect to Ethereum:
connect_also_with: While you can also connect with
advenced_configuration_needed: , a more advanced configuration is needed. See the
account_not_found: You are trying to access KantumID without an Ethereum account loaded. Select an account to use in your Ethereum browser.
use_client: If you are using Mist, please click the CONNECT button in the top right corner and authorize an account.
kantumid_desciption: KantumID is a decentralized application where a citizen can maintain and control their own health records, and then share with healthcare provider or reaserchers.
kantumid_warning: KantumID is undergoing pre-alpha testing: Any information saved on KantumID could be lost in the event of a security breach.
sentance_confirm_delete: Write: "I want to delete my account.", for delete your account.
